markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Returned](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=188)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 51 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

You died and miraculously returned with knowledge of the realms beyond death and a stronger link to life. Some dead and undead souls might feel a strange, instinctual kinship with you. 

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to **Constitution** or **Wisdom**, and one is a free ability boost.

 You gain the [Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=774) feat and the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=750) feat for [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Returned

text: Returned Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 51 2.0 You died and miraculously returned with knowledge of the realms beyond death and a stronger link to life. Some dead and undead souls might feel a strange, instinctual kinship with you. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom , and one is a free ability boost. You gain the Diehard feat and the Additional Lore feat for Boneyard Lore.
